meanings.definition: A code that is part of a larger code system.
meanings.sent1: The subcodes help organize the information in the system.
meanings.sent2: I found the subcodes within the main code.
meanings.sent3: The subcodes had a party and invited the main code.
meanings.sent4: The subcodes are like puzzle pieces fitting into the larger code.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the subcodes is key to understanding the entire system.

meanings.definition: To assign a subcode to a specific category.
meanings.sent1: She subcodes each item for easy sorting.
meanings.sent2: Remember to subcode the new entries correctly.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to subcode its toys by color.
meanings.sent4: Subcoding is like giving each item a special label.
meanings.sent5: Subcoding makes finding things much simpler.

meanings.definition: The act of breaking down a code into smaller components.
meanings.sent1: The subcodes allow for easier understanding of the complex code.
meanings.sent2: He studied the subcodes to simplify the code.
meanings.sent3: The subcodes decided to have a race to see who was fastest.
meanings.sent4: Breaking down the code into subcodes is like dissecting a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The subcodes act as a magnifying glass, revealing hidden details in the code.
